column2: Too many pets are following you.

Increases outgoing damage in the Fractals of the Mists. Stacks up to five times.

Entering beastmode grants boons and removes movement-impairing conditions.
Solve Jubua the Wildfire's fifth riddle.
You need an Inquest keypad to access this terminal.
Recipe Unlock: Double-click to unlock the Chef recipe for Bowl of Spiced Red Lentil Stew.

Dear %str1%, 

It was a sad day today in Winslow Manor. We had to bid farewell to our dear, devoted Mr. Nibbles. When he left us, he took a piece of me with him—specifically, one of my toes. But the domain soldiers on nonetheless. I'm even thinking of planting a garden!

All my best to you and yours,
Lord Blaine, Archduke of the Well of Winslow

Help Follower Xunn collect Forgotten Glyphs for decoding.
